title: Children of Gaia & Uktena
description: The Garou, the bestial werewolves who fight to save the natural world, have their backs to the wall. In Tribe Children of Gaia, the storyteller Cries Havoc, robbed of his memories by the Wyrm, fights to become whole again. In Tribe Uktena, another songkeeper named Amy Hundred-Voices comes face to face with Lord Arkady, the Silver Fang accused of conspiring with the Wyrm. Can she turn him from his destructive path?
author: Richard Lee Byers
